Texts.Chs: 在这个由15部分组成的纪录片系列中，我们将详细调查人类的交配习惯。从形状最不寻常的生殖器到奇异的姿势，打扮和华丽的习惯，以及其他一切与它们不寻常的哺乳动物交配仪式有关的东西。
Texts.Eng: In this 15 part docu-series, we'll be investigating human mating habits in detail. From the most unusually shaped genitals to the bizarre positions, preening and beauty habits, and everything else associated with their unusual mammalian mating rituals.

Texts.Chs: 有一种生物的交配习性是如此奇怪...如此非传统...以至于整个星际都对他们感到好奇。这些生物几乎在任何地方交配，除了娱乐或消磨时间的手段(在某些有记录的案例中)之外，没有任何理由。然而... 他们的怀孕期？漫长缓慢。他们的孩子？哭泣着，无助地哭了好一会儿。这是什么物种？答案是人类。
Texts.Eng: There exists a species so strange in its mating habits...so unorthodox...that literally the entire galaxy is curious about it. These creatures will mate nearly anywhere and for effectively no reason at all besides fun or a means to pass the time (in some documented cases). And yet...their gestation? Slow. Their young? Mewling and helpless for quite some time. The species? Human.

Texts.Chs: 人类迷惑行为大赏 Vol. 1
Texts.Eng: Why are Humans so strange? Vol. 1
